DOC.detailed_description: An open-label , randomize , single-dose , fixed-sequence crossover drug interaction study loperamide HCl grapefruit juice . About 33 healthy subject , equal number men woman , 18 59 year age , enrol 10 day trial . Subjects divide three cohort 11 subject . Each cohort receive red , white pink grapefruit juice . Subjects take 4 mg loperamide Day 1 . They ingest 8 ounce grapefruit juice 4 mg loperamide Day 3 . They ingest 8 ounce grapefruit juice morning evening Days 5 , 6 7 . On Day 8 , subject ingest 8 ounce juice 4 mg loperamide . Blood sample collect predose ( 0 ) 0.5 , 1 , 1.5 , 32 , 3 , 4 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 10 , 14 , 24 , 30 , 36 46 hour dose Day 1 , Day 3 Day 8 . Pupillometry assessment perform pre-dose ( 0 ) 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 12 hour dose Day 1 , Day 3 Day 8 . Subjects collect urine 8 PM 6 AM prior dosing Day 1 , Day 3 Day 8 .
